name: Sea Bear and the Quest for the Golden Sandwich
name_original: Sea Bear and the Quest for the Golden Sandwich
description:
WASD to move
SPACE to dash
E to interact with shopkeeper
Mouse to hover + click on dialogue boxes

Made for Global Game Jam 2021 (Online) by:
Mathemagician - dev
Trmrddr - 3D artist
Giraffalope - 2D artist
Redic - 3D Artist
Jason. - 3D artist

Thanks for playing!
